input.sentences: while on vacation | we went to a beautiful church .
once inside | the foyer had these wonderful arches .
this church was set into a generous countryside .
sunset from the church window was the perfect sight to end our day .
output.sentences: The Vatican is a beautiful church and adorns the European streets.
The inside foyer is ornated with a wonderful watering hole.
Upon exploring further, instricate sconces decorate the incredible prayer room.
This beautiful church is nestled in the heart of the countryside.
Gazing out a stained glass window, a angry sunset can be viewed.
